cpSIG
========================

Brief documentation for the ``cpSIG`` C++ library. We omit details
of the mathematical operations, for which we refer the user to the corresponding python documentation.

   cpsig/cp_transform_path
   cpsig/cp_sig_combine
   cpsig/cp_signature
   cpsig/cp_log_sig
   cpsig/cp_sig_kernel
